1614.book: The Book of the Rules of Inheritance
1614.reference:
Reference  : Sahih Muslim 1614
In-book reference  : Book 23, Hadith 1
USC-MSA web (English) reference  : Book 11, Hadith 3928
  (deprecated numbering scheme)
1614.text:
Usama b. Zaid reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:
A Muslim is not entitled to inherit from a non-Muslim, and a non-Muslim is not entitled to inherit from a Muslim.

Usama b. Zaid reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:
A Muslim is not entitled to inherit from a non-Muslim, and a non-Muslim is not entitled to inherit from a Muslim.
